original_title: Imputed rental income tax not intended for average-income earners: President
original_body_lines: Delivering a special statement in Parliament today (18), President Ranil Wickremesinghe commented on the introduction of the proposed imputed rental income tax.

The President gave an assurance that the first property would be exempted from taxation, while also noting that it is intended to focus on high-net-worth individuals and not average-income earners, the President’s Media Division reported.
